runs.comm: Short and staight. Spliced away to square leg.
Good delivery from Steyn this time. Big swing from Iqbal. To no avail.
Another one. This time he is rewarded with a single though.
Comes down the track, gets a little inside edge and the ball runs away to fine leg.
Shortish and quite straight. No real shot offered. Just defended off the backfoot.
Comes down the track and goes outside the line of leg stump. Louw pushes it slightly wider and gets away with another dot.
Huge wide this time though. Straight at the slips.
Excellent delivery from Louw. Taking the ball away from the left hander.
Boundary time. Pulled away mightily over midwicket. Makes astatement with that shot.
Another one going away too far.
Goes over the top, two fielders rushing back to get it. Not reaching the ball though.
Lazy running as the ball is hit out to deep midwicket. Only one.
Clipped off his hips but straight to shortish fine leg unfortunately.
Hit through midwicket. Kleinveldt chases it down but makes a mess with the slide. Boundary time.
Ouch. Hit on the upper body. Right on the shoulder I would think. Attempted pull. But way too late.
Pulled away through midwicket again. Deep square leg cuts it off though this time.
Great shot. Gives himself some room to go over the offside field. Cuts it over Point. Very Jayasuriya-like
Dot this time as he swings and misses.
Kleinveldt gets a wicket first ball on International Pro20 debut. Swings the ball away from the lefthander who only manages to get a slight little outside edge and straight into the keeper's gloves.
Wicket followed by a wide
Pulled away powerfully over deep square leg. Great shot with great timing.
Driven off the backfoot to cover and gets a quick single.
that's very wide down leg. De Villiers had no chance of saving that.
Single out to deep square leg. The bat flies away to fine leg. Swung hard at that.
Edge flies past the single slip and races to the third man fence.
Another boundary! Cut away powerfully past point and square of third man.
Worked off the hips down to fine leg.
Short and wide, hammers it past point again. Take that!
Play and miss. A much better length this time. Pitch it up.
Comes down the track. Hits one of the hardest square drives I've ever seen! Hits the boundary boards with a harder sound than this evening's thunder.
Better delivery this time. Play and miss for a good lin and length delivery.
Another wide outside off. South Africa in a slight spot of bother here.
Hits the pads and bounces off to the on side. Manages an easy single there.
The skipper brings himself on to owl. Taking off the pace and works immediately. First ball he bowls Ashraful clean. Important breakthrough that.
Pushed straight to point but gets an easy one in the inner circle
Another single in the circle.
Pushed down to long on for another single. Good over thus far.
Swept fine and the ball races away to fine leg fence.
Drop and go. Single to point.
Swing and miss again. Good bouncy delivery from Morkel.
Hits the thigh pad and drops straight down. Morkel tries to save it but they manage a single anyway.
Gone! Morkel gets the perfect area and the ball moves and bounces. Gets the outside edge and flies straight into the gloves of De Villiers.
Short and straight. Backward defence.
Another boundary, short and straight from Morkel, hits the helmet and runs away to the fine leg fence.
Stumped! Comes down the track and swings but misses. De Villiers is lightening fast and Tamim had no chance. Another one gone.
Swept away to deep square leg.
Runout. Completely unnecassary, tickled around the corner and has a big mess-up with their calling. Eventually he's short by a mile. Well done by Botha at the stumps.
Another stupid single taken. Nearly another wicket.
Tickled around the corner once more.
Little chinese cut as they say. Gets an inside edge and runs away to fine leg. Only manages a couple.
Edge! But no slip at this time. Runs away to third man fence.
Bounces off to square leg after hitting the thigh pad.
Short and straight. Pulled away mightily over midwicket. Take that Mr. Morkel.
Full and wide. But right on the spot with the length. No shot, no run.
Swing and miss. Excellent area hit by Morkel.
Pulled away over midwicket once again. too short too often I would say.
Worked around the corner to short 45.
Cut down to short 45 on the offside but Bosman fumbles the ball. They get the single.
Worked away to deep midwicket.
Worked off to deep square leg this time. Botha has bowled well so far.
Swing and miss. Dots are worth gold here. Critical last delivery
Wrong one. Excellent bowling by the captain, leading by example. Good spell.
Opens the front leg and smacks it over the top.
Tries to flick the ball over fine leg. Flicks it straight into his own helmet though. Calls for another helmet it seems.
Pushed to point this time. Gets an easy single once more.

Pulls it straight into the air, Botha at midwicket tries to take the catch ut falls just short, takes a shye at the keepers end where De Villiers gets the ball, both batsmen are at one end and eventually takes a Jonty Rhodes dive to dislodge the bails.
Big heave over midwicket. No man deep on the fence. They manage to get two though.
Driven out to the deep. Only one there.
Excellent slower delivery from Steyn, swing and miss, hits top of middle stump. Great death bowling shown here by first Louw and now Steyn.
Another close call single taken.
Short and staight. Right into his body. Gets another single of the bat though.
Another blockhole delivery, Razzak tires to go accros the line and walks just a bit too far. Steyn hits middle stump.
Nearly hits off stump this time. Just too good for Shahadat. Swing and miss again.
Full and straight, punched out to midwicket.
Full again. Driven out past cove this time out to the deep. Only picks up a couple.
Punched down to long on. Only one there. Thoughts of a second are killed quickly.
Swing and miss. Just outside off. Well bowled Johann Louw
Full and straight again. That's that. no more coming out of this one would think.

Full and straight again. Punched to mid off who makes a good save and slamps the door shut for any late consolation boundaries. Well done South Africa winning this Pro20, the only of the tour, by 12 runs. Thank you for joining us for this game and please do so again for the rest of this series between South Africa and Bangladesh.
